description: Try our easy to follow Moroccan Quinoa Soup With Coriander Yoghurt recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Soup,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Tree nut free,Egg free,Winter,Peanut free
name: Moroccan Quinoa Soup With Coriander Yoghurt Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tsp lemon juice, juiced and zested
2 tsp harissa Middle Eastern spice blend
400g no added salt black beans, rinsed

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add onion and cook for 5 minutes, stirring, or until onion softens. Add garlic and spices, and stir for 2 minutes or until fragrant.

Add pumpkin, beans and harissa, stirring to coat with spices. Stir in stock, tomatoes and 1 cup water. Bring to a simmer and cook for 12-15 minutes or until pumpkin is tender. Stir in quinoa, season with pepper and cook until heated through.
Meanwhile, mix yoghurt with some coriander, lemon juice and zest. Garnish soup with remaining coriander and serve with yoghurt and lemon wedges.
